Package actions.effects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Effect  
    EffectTemplate  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DamageEffect
    Deals a certain amount of damage to the actor of the given pawn
    DamageTemplate
    Gives a certain amount of damage to all BasicTargets targeted by a Target
    DiscardEffect  
    Fire
    This effect is to be used when you want to fire a weapon during the turn.
    GrabEffect
    Method used to handle the Grab of object from the Map
    GrabTemplate  
    MarkEffect
    Method used to handle the marking of a certain player
    MarkTemplate  
    MoveEffect  
    MoveTemplate  
    PayTemplate  
    PayWildCardTemp  
    PayWithAmmoEffect  
    PayWithPowUpEffect  
    ReloadTemplate  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EffectType
    This enum contains all the Effects that can be achieved during the game
